Sales and Vendor Partnerships

The material DSPs integrated with our systems are as follows. Customers can utilize allowlists and blocklists (f/k/a whitelists or blacklists) of certain DSPs from this list. Note advertisers purchasing ad inventory through these DSPs also use their own adtech vendors (buy side ad servers, measurement providers, etc.)
